items.sentence: They all stopped and turned to see what was happening.
You should've learned how to swim when you were young.
You should've done it earlier. It can't be helped now.
The cap that my mom bought for me is too small for me.
Is Tom the only one here who doesn't have a chauffeur?
No matter how rough things get, we'll survive somehow.
I'm just learning how to do this, like everybody else.
I'm not sure about the others, but I plan to be there.
Tom is going to bake a cake for Mary's birthday party.
What's so special about the first sunrise of the year?
I don't want you to tell anybody what I just told you.
It's been very tough to get anything done around here.
It made little sense to do that, so we decided not to.
Tom didn't want to tell you, but I told him he should.
I can't speak French, but I hope I'll be able to soon.
I can't think of any reason that we shouldn't do that.
The rugged terrain made the troops' advance difficult.
The older Tom gets, the more he looks like his father.
Tom said he'd rather stay at a hotel near the airport.
If I could go anywhere in the world, I'd go to Boston.
